record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="menu" and term=NULL and format.name="menu.prompt" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: menu
record.format.name: menu.prompt

brief.brief: Select a function with a function key or enter a valid command to access any function on any menu.
The command may refer to a function on the currently displayed menu or on any other menu in Service Manager.
The key you use to activate each function is the one that corresponds to the characters displayed to the left of the function description.

detail.detail: Menu manager stores all valid commands in the menu table.
You can display them using Database Manager.
*mMAIN: Displays the menu that starts with the letters MAIN.
*fcust: Calls the Database Manager on the table that starts with the letters cust.
#db: Displays a list of commands that start with db.
